tool_description: Searches legal databases for cases matching specified criteria, returning relevant case citations with summaries and key metadata for litigation research.

search_query.description: Legal search terms, case names, or natural language query describing the legal issue

jurisdiction.description: List of jurisdictions to search (e.g., federal, state names, circuit numbers)

court_level.description: Court level filter: supreme, appellate, trial, administrative

date_range_start.description: Start date for case decisions (ISO 8601 format)

date_range_end.description: End date for case decisions (ISO 8601 format)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-500)

error_messages: Empty search query: Provide a non-empty search query with legal terms or case names
Invalid jurisdiction format: Use standard jurisdiction names (e.g., 'federal', 'california', '9th circuit')
Invalid date range: Ensure start date is before end date and both are valid ISO 8601 format
Invalid court level: Use one of [supreme, appellate, trial, administrative]
Max results out of range: Set max_results between 1 and 500
Search timeout: Query too broad, refine search terms or narrow jurisdiction scope
usage: Provide search_query and jurisdiction array. Optionally filter by court_level, date range, and result limit. Returns ranked case results with citations and relevance scores.

total_results.description: Total number of cases found matching the search criteria

case_citations.description: Array of properly formatted legal citations for found cases

case_titles.description: Array of case titles corresponding to the citations

relevance_scores.description: Relevance scores (0-100) for each case relative to the search query

court_names.description: Names of courts that decided each case

decision_dates.description: Decision dates for each case in ISO 8601 format
